text: Kufanana kwa amene amapereka chuma chawo mâ€™njira ya Mulungu kuli ngati njere ya tirigu imene imabereka njere zina zisanu ndi ziwiri ndipo ililonse imabereka njere zana limodzi. Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa amene wamufuna. Ndipo Mulungu ali ndi zonse zimene zolengedwa zake zimafuna. Iye amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse
